Title: Creates an interagency coordinating committee for streamlined services for the aging
Summary: Creates an interagency coordinating committee for streamlined services for the aging; directs the development of a simplified application for seniors to access needs-based programs.
LawCode: Add Art 2 Title 2 ยง230, Eld L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law, in relation to the interagency coordinating committee for streamlined services for the aging
